blogPost.excerpt: Control solves compliance with one integration. SOC2, ISO 27001, PCI & more. No more complex legalese, writing policies or manually running endless checks across your systems. Accelerate & automate your security program and SOC2 compliance for FREE today.
blogPost.body: Control solves compliance with one integration. SOC2, ISO 27001, PCI & more. No more complex legalese, writing policies or manually running endless checks across your systems. Accelerate & automate your security program and SOC2 compliance for FREE today.
blogPost.title: Control - Accelerate and automate security & SOC2 compliance for free
blogPost.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 控制解决了一次集成的合规性。SOC2、ISO 27001、PCI等。不再需要复杂的法律条文、编写政策或在您的系统中手动运行无休止的检查。加速和自动化您的安全程序和SOC2合规性，今天免费。
localize.tagline: 免费加速和自动化安全和SOC2合规性。

next.excerpt: The very first all-in-one Clubhouse management platform: The MVP version of Direcon is designed to solve the urgent problems of people who moderate rooms on Clubhouse like lack of insights about their rooms and limited moderation options.
next.title: Direcon for Clubhouse - All-in-one Clubhouse management platform

localize.description: 第一款一体化的Clubhouse管理平台。MVP版的Direcon是为了解决在Clubhouse上管理房间的人的迫切问题 比如缺乏对房间的了解和有限的管理选择。
第一款一體化的Clubhouse管理平臺。MVP版的Direcon是爲了解決在Clubhouse上管理房間的人的迫切問題 比如缺乏對房間的瞭解和有限的管理選擇。
